## R Packages

### rwicc

Regression with interval-censored covariates: Application to cross-sectional incidence estimation.

This package implements methods for generalized linear regression with interval-censored covariates, with applications to HIV incidence estimation.

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/d-morrison/rwicc)
- [Package Documentation](https://d-morrison.github.io/rwicc)
- [Publication](https://doi.org/10.1111/biom.13472)

## Research Projects

### COVID-19 School Modeling

Agent-based model of infection dynamics and mitigation strategies to support K-6 in-person instruction during the COVID-19 pandemic.

- [Publication](https://doi.org/10.1101/2021.02.27.21252535)

### Cross-Sectional HIV Incidence Estimation

Development of statistical methods for estimating HIV incidence from cross-sectional surveys using biomarkers of recent infection.

- Multiple publications in this area (see [Publications](publications.qmd))
